content: For the quarter ending September 30, 2022, Upland expects reported total revenue to be between $75.7 million and $81.7 million, including subscription and support revenue between $70.8 million and $76.2 million for growth in total revenue of 3% to midpoint over the quarter ended September 30, 2021. For the full year ending December 31, 2022, Upland expects reported total revenue to be between $310.5 million and $322.5 million, including subscription and support revenue between $290.4 million and $301.2 million for growth in total revenue of 5% at the midpoint over the year ended December 31, 2021.
